text: Arie "Aar" de Goede (21 May 1928 - 16 May 2016) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Democrats 66. He served in the House of Representatives (1967–1973), European Parliament (1979–1984) and Senate (1986–1987). As part of the executive he was State Secretary of Finance between 1973 and 1977. De Goede died in Zoeterwoude on 16 May 2016, aged 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:People from Vlaardingen Category:Politicians from South Holland
title: Aar de Goede
